div.p: SURE I DO, LEN. ENJOY THE BIBLE.
FINALLY THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, GETTING TO SLEEP.
FOR MANY OF US, IT'S HARD. IN FACT, ABOUT 40 MILLION
AMERICANS HAVE SLEEP PROBLEMS. THERE IS A WEBSITE CALLED
SLEEP.COM. IT HAS TIPS FOR YOU.
THERE IS NO SURE CURE. I AVOID TAKING MEDICATION AND
WHEN I CAN'T SLEEP, I READ. SO I PUT THE TIME TO GOOD USE.
MY EYES EVENTUALLY GET HEAVY AND I DOZE AWAY.
NEVER DO I WATCH TV. NEVER DO I GO ON THE DOPEY
MACHINES, TEXTING, ANYTHING LIKE THAT.
SOME FOLKS SWEAR WARM MILK MAKES THEM DROWSY, BUT THAT SEEMS A
LITTLE AUNT BEA-ISH TO ME. MIGHT WORK IN MAYBERRY.
TOUGHER IN NEW YORK CITY. I MAY TRY IT.
HERE'S THE TIP OF THE DAY.
JUST ROLL WITH IT IF YOU CAN'T
SLEEP. ROLL WITH IT.
RE LAX AND READ. THINK ABOUT NICE THINGS THAT
HAPPENED TO YOU RECENTLY. IF YOU HAVE SLEEP ADVICE, SEND
IT TO E AND I WILL PASS IT ALONG.
THAT'S IT FOR US TONIGHT. SOUND OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR.
